explanation: [0-0] A little boy sits in a barbershop, with short black curly hair. He wears a black cape, and a vertical needle stands in his hair. A male barber stands behind him, wearing a black short-sleeved shirt, with short black hair and a black beard. Another man in a white short-sleeved T-shirt and blue jeans, with short black hair and a black beard, stands to the left, facing the camera. Crystal chandeliers and recessed lighting hang from the ceiling in the background. Large mirrors adorn the walls, reflecting other people. The floor is grey.

[0-6] The man in the white short-sleeved shirt walks past the frame, patting the barber's back. The barber picks up a green balloon, walks behind the boy, and smashes it against his head. The balloon doesn't pop. The little boy smiles at the camera. The barber leans forward, touching the needle with his hand. At this moment, a man in a white down jacket enters the right side of the frame, wearing a black bracelet on his right wrist and a watch on his left, with both hands on the needle in the boy's hair.
